codeSystems.name: CaregiverGASFollowup
codeSystems.title: Caregiver Follow-Up GAS Score
codeSystems.description: The caregiver follow-up score indicates how the caregiver rated either the patient's progress or their own progress on goal attainment scaling.

codeSystems.name: PatientGASFollowup
codeSystems.title: Patient Follow-Up GAS Score
codeSystems.description: The patient follow-up score indicates how the patient rated their own progress on goal attainment scaling.

codeSystems.name: PCOCategoryValueSet
codeSystems.title: PCO Categories
codeSystems.description: Example value set to identify the category for PCO resources.

codeSystems.name: PractitionerGASFollowup
codeSystems.title: Practitioner Follow-Up GAS Score
codeSystems.description: The practitioner follow-up score indicates how the practitioner rated the patient's progress on goal attainment scaling.

codeSystems.name: PROMTargetMeasures
codeSystems.title: PROM Target Measures
codeSystems.description: Target measure codes used to track progress on patient-reported outcome measures (PROMs).

codeSystems.name: WhatMattersFocusAreas
codeSystems.title: What Matters Focus Areas
codeSystems.description: Example value set to identify focus areas from the VA Circle of Health. Whole Health is VAâ€™s approach to care that supports your health and well-being. Whole Health centers around What Matters to you, not what is the matter with you. This means your health team will get to know you as a person, before working with you to develop a personalized health plan based on your values, needs, and goals.
